thread.title: Disneyland Is Giving You Another Reason to Get Excited For What's to Come in 2017
thread.title_full: Disneyland Is Giving You Another Reason to Get Excited For What's to Come in 2017

author: Sarah Siegel
title: Disneyland Is Giving You Another Reason to Get Excited For What's to Come in 2017
text:
Main Street Electrical Parade Returns to Disneyland Disneyland Is Giving You Another Reason to Get Excited For What's to Come in 2017 January 9, 2017 by Sarah Siegel 269 Shares 
If you have fond memories of the Disneyland Main Street Electrical Parade complete with the synthesized "Baroque Hoedown" music, you're in luck! The magical procession is returning to Anaheim for a limited time. 
The triumphant return starts Jan. 20 and runs through June 18. Disney fans can see nightly performances of the beloved march complete with all of the characters they know and love. 
If you can't wait to see your favorite Disney attraction back in action, Disneyland annual pass holders can purchase a special ticket for the Jan. 19 preview. The tickets for the preview performance went on sale to the public on Dec. 13. To purchase tickets, you can visit your local ticket booth or call 714-781-4636. 
All the original characters will return prancing down Main Street including Mickey and Minnie Mouse, Cinderella in her pumpkin carriage, Peter Pan and Captain Hook sparring on the Jolly Roger (now with Tinker Bell and her fairy friends in tow), and Pete and his dragon Elliot, all illuminated in thousands of lights. Get ready to revisit one of your favorite childhood memories in 2017, and get a sneak peek of the event ahead. Jan 9, 2017 at 3:34pm PST Related:
